import React, { useState,useRef } from 'react' import './App.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye, faEyeSlash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import images from './assets/images' function App () { const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false) const [isIconVisible, setIsIconVisible] = useState(true) const containerRef = useRef(null) const togglePasswordVisibility = () => { setShowPassword(!showPassword) } const handleClickOutside = e => { if (containerRef.current && !containerRef.current.contains(e.target)) { setIsIconVisible(false) } else { setIsIconVisible(true) } } return (
